original_text:
And they will raise a lamentation over you and say to you,
“‘How you have perished,
    you who were inhabited from the seas,
O city renowned,
    who was mighty on the sea;
she and her inhabitants imposed their terror
    on all her inhabitants!
korean_text: 그들이 너를 위하여 슬픈 노래를 불러 이르기를 항해자가 살았던 유명한 성읍이여 너와 너의 주민이 바다 가운데에 있어 견고하였도다 해변의 모든 주민을 두렵게 하였더니 어찌 그리 멸망하였는고

sentences.original_text: And they will raise a lamentation over you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 너를 위해 애가를 올릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: you who were inhabited from the seas
who was mighty on the sea
she and her inhabitants imposed their terror
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 그 거주자들은 그들의 공포를 강요했다
